column6: Venom is back and this time he's targeting Spider-Girl's closest friends!  Plus: Mary Jane makes a startling discovery! Guest-starring: the Human Torch, Lyja, Darkdevil and the Phil Urich Green Goblin!
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | letterer:Dave Sharpe
